content: {A烦恼}I used to see plants turn black and thought that they were done for, so I associated the color with helplessness... and that really kills my mood~!

content: Still, thank you for thinking of me. Well mah, how about we pick a different color? {A害羞冒烟}}S-Sorry!

content: Ever since I was little mah, that smell always made me cough... Gran'mama said my immune system was too weak, so she dragged me along for mornin' exercises every day. And that's how I said goodbye to lazy mornin's.
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感4-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: {A烦恼}Ever since I was little mah, I've been coughing at the smell of <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style>, and it makes me sneeze and struggle to breathe. It looks lovely, but I-I can't wear it. Thank you anyway!
